# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate of the scroll view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIScrollViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollViewDelegate] protocol. The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollView] class, which doesn’t retain the delegate, invokes each protocol method the delegate implements.

## Responding to scroll view interactions

- **UIScrollViewDelegate**: The interface for the delegate of a scroll view.
